dict.acceptation: 练习；实践；（医生或律师的）业务；惯例；
实行；惯常地进行；练习；实习；
实行，实践；执业；练习；惯常地进行；

sent.orig: Any theory originate practice, serve for practice again and suffer practice place to examine.
sent.trans: 任何理论来源于实践，又为实践服务并受实践所检验。

sent.orig: Practice, practice and practice is the only way to success.
sent.trans: 练习，练习，再练习，是成功的唯一途经。

sent.orig: Practice, practice, practice, and don't give up.
sent.trans: 练习，练习，练习，永远不要放弃。

sent.orig: Discourse and practice are interdependent. Practice follows discourse, while discourse is generated by practice.
sent.trans: 话语与实践相互依存。实践需要遵循的话语。而话语则产生于实践。

sent.orig: The basic practice is divided into practice for subsistence and practice for development.
sent.trans: 基本实践分生存实践和发展实践。
